title: Wonderful 2Bed -1Bath Centrally Located!!!! Specials offered!
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 975 Sq.
Nestled on five terraced, tree-lined acres, the Radford complex has been home to hundreds of Angelenos for more than a quarter century.
Comfortable and affordable, the apartments are conveniently located, with easy access to the freeway, to downtown L.A., and the suburban hubs.
Please contact us today earn about our quiet secluded living and the benefits to renting with us!

Spacious closets, Window coverings, Refrigerator, Vinyl flooring in kitchen and bath, Hardwood floors*, Balconies*, Stove, View*, Tub/shower combinations, Living room entry closets, Wall to wall carpeting*, Ceramic tile counters, Back door, Covered carport with private storage area, Double sink with garbage disposal, Broom closet
Onsite Laundry facilities, Garden courtyard, Bus service in front of complex, Additional parking and storage units available*, Cable Ready
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
